mapper.select: SELECT id,course_id,start_day,end_day,name FROM deadline WHERE course_id IN (select course_id from courseChoose where project_id = #{project_id});
SELECT id, name, path,description,web_url,ucode ,homepage FROM team WHERE name = #{team}
SELECT id, name, path,description,web_url,ucode FROM team WHERE name like #{team};
SELECT id, name, web_url,created_at,bio,email,studentno FROM studentinfo WHERE name IN(select name from teamstudent where team = #{team})
SELECT id, name, web_url,path,groupid FROM groupproject WHERE groupid IN(select id from team where name = #{team})
SELECT id, team, token,words,`time` FROM projectComment WHERE team=#{team} order by `time` desc
select count(*) from projectComment where team=#{team} AND token=#{token} AND time>=#{time}

SELECT p.id AS id, g.name as name, team, `day`, commit_count, add_line, delete_line,java_file,total_commit,total_add,total_delete FROM projectCommit p, groupproject g WHERE team=#{team} AND `day` >= #{startDay} AND `day` <= #{endDay} AND p.id = g.id

SELECT p.id AS id, g.name as name,sum(commit_count) AS commit_count, sum(add_line) AS add_line,sum(delete_line) AS delete_line,sum(`java_file`) AS java_file, max(total_commit) AS total_commit,max(total_add) AS total_add,max(total_delete) AS total_delete,team FROM projectCommit p, groupproject g WHERE p.id = g.id AND `day` >= #{startDay} AND `day` <= #{endDay} group by id
ORDER BY `${order}` ${method}
SELECT id, team, `day`, push, issue, comment, create,total FROM projectEvent WHERE team=#{team} AND `day` >= #{startDay} AND `day` <= #{endDay};

SELECT id,sum(push) AS push, sum(issue) AS issue,sum(comment) AS comment,sum(`create`) AS `create`, sum(total) AS total,team FROM projectEvent WHERE `day` >= #{startDay} AND `day` <= #{endDay} group by id
ORDER BY `${order}` ${method}
SELECT `${item}` FROM projectEvent WHERE team=#{team} AND `day` >= #{startDay} AND `day` <= #{endDay} order by `day` asc;
SELECT `${item}` FROM projectEvent WHERE team=#{team} AND `day` >= #{startDay} AND `day` <= #{endDay} order by `day` asc;
